QuestData.Title: While We're in the Neighborhood
QuestData.Description: Ah, the hubris of ogres.$B$BIt always backfires.$B$BMorkurk has been using enchanted bracelets to empower his minions with arcane strength.$B$BWe can disenchant these bracelets into reagents that will no doubt be useful to your arcane sanctum. What do you think about collecting some while we're here?
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, these will definitely be useful! Trust me.
